WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

After I installed WPP three months ago, an issue usually annoys me, that's I create adobe reader and flashplayer updates in WPP successfully, then I published and deployed them in WPP. They worked well as expect.

But after few days, they disappeared from WPP console, I couldn't find them....So I recreated them again manually. But again, after few days, I find they disappear again today.

Is this a WPP bug? 

Or my WPP updates will disappear after WSUS receives new updates from Microsoft at middle of every months?

I find those WPP updates that are configured to be visable in WSUS, are still visible in WSUS console; but those WPP updates are not configured to be visable in WSUS, are not INVISIBLE in BOTH WSUS and WPP consoles.

Please see my attached picture. Thanks for you help!

BR

Comments.Message:
Open WPP, Tools > Settings > Servers.
[X] Connect to local Server.
[X] Always make this update visible in WSUS Console.

Tools > Settings > Updates.
[X] Show locally..

Misc. [X] When starting, connect to the last used server.

After you made this settings, restart WPP.
